channel.title: [317] How would i edit the .DAT savegame files?
channel.description:
Well im working on a 317 Server, and i was wondering how i could edit the .DAT savegame files within the server?
The .DAT file is obfucted meaning it is not possible to read by hand.
Here is a screenshot of what i mean: [URL=http://img220.imageshack.us/my.php?image=rs2datfileeditga6.jpg][IMG]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/6797/rs2datfileeditga6.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
Thanks :)

item.title: [317] How would i edit the .DAT savegame files?

@Arizane wrote:

Its been done because ive seen .bat viewers and editors that came with some clients.

Just cant find it though
